sys_ui_page.html:
Interface Configuration Manager

Welcome to Interface Configuration Manager - created and maintained by Tom Hauri.

Overview

Interface Configuration Manager provides an easy way to manage complex interfaces using JSON structures and providing different interface technology.

Disclaimer

Interface Configuration Manager is NOT an officially supported ServiceNow product. Interface Configuration Manager does NOT come with any kind of warranty. If you use it, you own it!

System Requirements

  • Utah or later
  • Access to https://github.com/haurit/now-interfacecm

Release Notes

1.0.0 - 12.2023

  1. Initial Release

Problem Statement

Sustainable solutions are configurable so that you don't have to change the code to adapt to changing requirements.

Interface Configuration Manager can use the same interface configuration to configure multiple technology stacks.

ATF Test

To successfully pass the ATF tests it might be neccesary to add the common client errors to the whitelist.
